record.fda_outcome_description: Complete Response Letter — FDA concluded AURORA and BEACON trials did not sufficiently demonstrate association between PPIX reduction (surrogate biomarker) and sunlight exposure-based clinical endpoints.
record.fda_key_issue: Surrogate endpoint insufficiency — exactly matching ODIN surrogate_only signal
record.classification_rationale: ODIN Tier 3 (65.9%) with SMALL_POSITION_EARLY_EXIT correctly identified significant risk. Key signal surrogate_only (-0.45) directly predicted the FDA rationale (surrogate biomarker insufficiency). Recommended exit at T-5 to T-7 would have avoided the 22% decline. Risk management framework validated.

surrogate_only.description: ODIN flagged PPIX as surrogate-only endpoint. FDA CRL stated trials did not sufficiently show association between PPIX reduction and clinical endpoints. EXACT MATCH.

inexperienced_sponsor.description: Disc Medicine first NDA submission. Inexperienced navigating FDA review process for novel mechanism.

ta_high_risk.description: Hematology classified as HIGH_RISK therapeutic area. Historical approval rate below average.

novice_high_risk_ta.description: Interaction term: inexperienced sponsor in high-risk TA. Compounding risk correctly identified.

integrity.note: This hash covers the complete record object above. Any modification to the record will invalidate this hash. The git commit hash provides additional immutability via distributed version control.
